aliases.improperStructure: Improper structure in config.js for commandBindings
aliases.doesNotExist: The alias {{alias}} for the command {{command}} does not exist
aliases.alreadyExists: The alias {{alias}} for the command {{command}} already exists

events.quitLogging: Quit server and left {{- channels}} because {{- reason}}
events.nickChanged: Changed Nickname from {{- oldnick}} to {{- newnick}}
events.commandTriggered: {{- from}} on {{- to}} has triggered the {{cmd}} command from the {{group}} group

auth.notMemberOfGroup: You are not a member of the group {{group}}. Access denied
auth.notMemberOfGroupLogging: {{- nick}} on {{- channel}} tried to use the {{group}} command {{type}}
auth.notIdentified: You must be identified with NickServ to use the {{- cmd }} command {{- from}}

errors.moreInformation: I need some more information, {{- nick}}
errors.invalidCommand: I am sorry, {{- from}}, I am unable to do that. Let me clarify, {{- cmd}} is an invalid command
errors.invalidIdentCommand: Error with identified command {{- cmd}} from {{- from}} to {{- to}}
